description:
The news of Kurokan getting fired has been spread out! Without Kurokan, the seniors are successfully bribed by villagers and the freshmen become helpless.
Asia and Kurokan are at the shrine in the middle of the night. Asai reports everything about the team to him. Kurokan needs Asai to lead the team without his presence. 
One day after a practice, when Hiraizumi is about to let the coach say a few words, Kurokan shows up. 
Everyone is stunned! The freshmen and Hiraizumi show no fear to the villagers and keep following Kurokan! Because everyone knows, only Kurokan can lead the team to Koshien!
Source: crunchyroll
